sourcesContent:
import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';

function Navbar() {
  const location = useLocation(); // Hook to check the current route

  return (
    <nav>
      <button className={location.pathname === '/' ? 'active-btn' : ''}>
        <Link to="/">Home</Link>
      </button>
      <button className={location.pathname === '/challenges' ? 'active-btn' : ''}>
        <Link to="/challenges">Challenges</Link>
      </button>
      <button className={location.pathname === '/solutions' ? 'active-btn' : ''}>
        <Link to="/solutions">Solutions</Link>
      </button>
      <button className={location.pathname === '/future-scope' ? 'active-btn' : ''}>
        <Link to="/future-scope">Future Scope</Link>
      </button>
      <button className={location.pathname === '/explore-more' ? 'active-btn' : ''}>
        <Link to="/explore-more">Explore More</Link>
      </button>
    </nav>
  );
}

export default Navbar;
